tetraclasse 0.1.22

    • Getting actionable insights from a satisfaction survey

gen_llosa

gen_llosa.Rd

plot the Llosa matrix

gen_llosa(
  dataset,
  borne = FALSE,
  annotate = TRUE,
  annotatetext = c("Secondary- \n \"Little Influence\"",
    " Plus - \n \"Satisfaction\"", "Basic - \n \"Disatisfaction\"",
    "Key - \n \"Regardless\"")
)

Arguments

dataset

the dataset to use
borne

booleen do you want xlim and ylim
annotate

booleen do you want annotation
annotatetext

annotation text

Examples



library(tetraclasse)
gen_satis(100) %>%
  prepare_base() %>%
  gen_llosa()

#> $info
#> $info$PP

#> $info$NN
